translated: The Jātaka🔽The Collection of Long Discourses
The Chapter on the Twenty-One Kinds of Loneliness🔽The Jātaka of the Monkey King
“For one who has these three things,
The sun of insight is seen,
and what is seen is overcome.”
The Jātaka of the Monkey King is the eighth.
